description: Sample memory managers search flow model

metadata.label: Short Term Memory
metadata.description: A short-term memory implementation to manage recent interactions, with support to customize overflow handling and integrate stores for persistence.

metadata.label: Message Window Chat Memory
metadata.description: A memory implementation that stores chat messages in a window format, allowing for efficient retrieval and management of recent interactions.

metadata.label: Message Window Chat Memory (ballerinax)
metadata.description: A memory implementation that stores chat messages in a window format, allowing for efficient retrieval and management of recent interactions.
